summary: A vibrant argonian preset for racemenu.
descriptionHtml:
Hi there! Namea here and this is my first upload for Skyrim. 
I love to browse the presets here and I think they're a great way for people to share their creations and characters even if they aren't experienced modders. One thing I noticed however is that there are a lot of pretty white people and not a lot else. Beast races are almost nonexistent! 

Since someone had already requested I share Saicar I figured I'd give it a shot so here she is. 
[font=Times New Roman][size=3]
[b]Required Mod:[/b][/size][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url] - By [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481]expired6978

[/url][b][size=3]Mods for exact match:[/size][/b]
These aren't required if you just want to use her as a base or something but to get her exactly like the screenies you'll need:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58857/?]Hot Argonians with Argonian Feathered Hair[/url] - By KriaKitty and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7013490]nerdofprey[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52888/?]Argonian Skintones[/url] -  by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2589890]ZombieData


[/url][b][font=Times New Roman][size=3]Installation:[/size][/font][/b]
I know most people are well-versed in this. If you are please feel free to skip it and hum merrily. For those who need a refresher however:
- Download manually
- Place the "Saicar.Jslot" file into your Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data/SKSE/Plugins/Chargen/Presets folder. If you do not have one you can safely create one. 
- Go in-game and either start a new game or type "Showracemenu" into the console. The character creation menu will pop up. Choose the "Presets" tab then choose "Load Preset" and choose Saicar from the list. You MUST be set to the argonian race or odd things can happen!
[center][/center]
[center][img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v333/snakeflame/Skyrim/ScreenShot405.jpg[/img]
[left][/left]
[/center]
[b][size=3]Mods used in Screenies[/size][/b]
- UNP body
- Hott Argonians Standalone
- HDT Cloaks of Skyrim
- Dark Brotherhood 4k retexture
- Tons of texture mods. If you wanna know just ask!

[b][size=3]ENB:[/size][/b]
Realvision for Climates of Tamriel 5 - Fantasy edition
Immersive Saturation Boost (To add more colour)

[b]I'd love to see your pictures of her in your game![/b]
author: Namea
